original_text: Put the bread and the biscuits into a basket. Bring them to the Tent of Meeting with the bull and the two sheep.
korean_text: 그것들을 한 광주리에 담고 그것을 광주리에 담은 채 그 송아지와 두 양과 함께 가져오라

sentences.original_text: Put the bread and the biscuits into a basket
Bring them to the Tent of Meeting
with the bull and the two sheep
